title: Best coffee shops in downtown?
description: Looking for a cozy place to work with good WiFi and excellent coffee. Any recommendations in the downtown area?

title: Is the farmers market still happening on Saturdays?
description: I heard there was a farmers market every Saturday in the town square. Is this still happening? What time does it start?

title: Looking for a reliable plumber
description: Need someone to fix a leaky faucet and check some pipes. Anyone have recommendations for honest, reasonably priced plumbers in the area?

title: New restaurant opening on Main Street
description: Saw construction wrapping up at the old bakery location. Anyone know what type of restaurant is going in there? Looks like it might be Italian?

title: Best hiking trails for beginners?
description: Just moved to the area and want to start hiking. What are some good beginner-friendly trails with nice views? Not looking for anything too strenuous.

title: Power outage in Oak Hill neighborhood?
description: Anyone else experiencing power outages in Oak Hill? Been out for about an hour now. Wondering if it's widespread or just my block.
